Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Add roadmap for 2022" (#1083) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "AddImagePart extension method to support GetImagePartType feature" (#1082) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
I was unsure of where to add the functionality described in #1081

I ultimately decided that it might be best to create an `ImagePartExtensions` class that:

1. Defines a `GetImagePartType` method given an associated file extension string.
2. Overloads `AddImagePart` with a version that takes the file extension string and adds the `ImagePart` using the native method, but retrieving the `ImagePartType` via the above method.

If there is a better place / approach for this feature, please let me know so that I have a better grasp on where to accomplish similar features in the future should they arise. Thanks!

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Feature Proposal: method to retrieve ImagePartType from file extension" (#1081) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Issue1069 check for model/gltf.binary content type and accept" (#1075) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This fix checks to see if the part content type is "model/gltf.binary" and the expected part is "model/gltf-binary". If so, then the SDK accepts the part as is. Both will be consumed but the SDK will continue to write out "model/gltf-binary" as this is the current standard and is accepted by PowerPoint.
